ComicInfo.Penciller: Bill Black,Chris Allan,Chris Allen,Dick Ayers,Nick Northey
ComicInfo.Summary:
FeFo#70 All Color!!! Remember that climactic point in FF#64, when Too Tall Tara was suddenly rocketed from her adventure on Taragonia island, into Los Angeles with Garganta and Nightveil? Well , this story tells the tale of what happened that day. (And, it's actually the wrap-up of the Wild Side series that ran in Jungle Girls #'s 14-16.) The giantess and her jungle girl cohorts get a visit from Nightveil, who warns them that the island they are on is really at the nexus of a dimensional implosion that occured when a mystic war involving and ancient sorcerer and his consort took place there centuries earlier. Nuclear testing on the island several decades ago has somehow brought the evil sorcerer Shinduu, and his mate Varushka back to life, bringing all sort of time anomalies with them. "Beware... Shinduu The Sorcerer" is written by Bill Black, drawn by Black ,Nick Northey and Chris Allen, and inked by Dell Barras and Mark Heike. Guest starring Nyoka, Cave Girl Tygra and Princess Pantha. Then, Darkfire continues her deadly masquerade as a double agent among the League Of Alternative Science. When an attack on Dr. Macabre by Catman and Kitten requires her to mentally create a beast to rip Kitten to , (or risk blowing her cover ) it turns out to have been nothing more than a test with robots. Are these guys nuts, or what? This untitled story is written by Bill Black, and drawn by Dick Ayers with inks by Chad Hunt. It guest stars Margo Nadeau. Color cover by Bill Black. Full color throughout. Standard comic book format.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-14 15:00:21. [CVDB97197]
